effect.black_white: User’s type changes according to the terrain. Terrain | New type -------------- | -------------- Building | normal Cave | rock Desert | ground Grass | grass Mountain | rock Ocean | water Pond | water Road | ground Snow | ice Tall grass | grass In Pokémon Battle Revolution: Terrain | New type -------------- | -------------- Courtyard | normal Crystal | rock Gateway | water Magma | rock Main Street | normal Neon | normal Stargazer | rock Sunny Park | grass Sunset | ground Waterfall | grass

short_effect.black_white: User’s type changes to match the terrain.

flavor_text.black_white: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.
